value.original: Make openbravo easier to use by providing import data process, fast configuration, and approval routing.

row.value: Make openbravo easier to use by providing import data process, fast configuration, and approval routing.

value.original: General improvement of Openbravo ERP, developed by Wirabumi Software. This module will provide you: 1. additional alert 2. import file format 3. approval rule and threshold amount restriction rule 4. configuration wizard 5. improvement of requisition to order form 6. additional reporting 7. bug fix

row.value: General improvement of Openbravo ERP, developed by Wirabumi Software. This module will provide you: 1. additional alert 2. import file format 3. approval rule and threshold amount restriction rule 4. configuration wizard 5. improvement of requisition to order form 6. additional reporting 7. bug fix
